title: What are some of the best father daughter relationship songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not a song but cartoon called “Angry Beavers” we would watch episodes and pretend to be characters. Like in one truly great episode one of the beaver brothers wanted to be a super hero called “Muscular Beaver”and the other played the villain “Baron Bad Beaver”. We immediately became “Muscular Tesla” her name is Tesla and I was “Baron Bad Daddy” it seamed to take over our true identities when ever we were alone together. Soon our safety code also became part of the Angry Beavers. If I ever had to send someone to get here incase of emergency the code was Baron Bad Daddy sent me a code no one would ever suspect. We still call each other by these names occasionally and she is about to turn 27.
Here is one of the best song when a child grows and his/her relation changes with father. A must watch
